name: swishy
content:
swishy adjective
(MOVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something, especially a piece of clothing, that is swishy, moves through the air making a soft sound: a long swishy skirt

swishy adjective
(LIKE A WOMAN)
US slang disapproving A swishy man behaves or appears in a way that is generally considered more suited to a woman.
